text: C E N T R A L B A N K OF SRI L A N K A
A N N U A L R E P O R T
OF THE MONETARY BOARD TO THE

Part I - Printed at J & S Services Pvt. Ltd, 115, Messenger Street, Colombo 12. Parts II, III, IV, & Statistical Appendix - Printed at the Central Bank Printing Press, No. 58, Sri Jayewardenepura Mawatha, Rajagiriya Published by the Central Bank of.Sri Lanka, World Trade Center, Echelon Square, Colombo 1.
AND MINISTER OF FINANCE AND PLANNING MINISTRY OF FINANCE AND PLANNING COLOMBO
Section 35 ofthe Monetary Law Act (Chapter 422) requires the Monetary Board of
the Central Bank of Sri Lanka to submit an Annual Report to your Excellency on the state of
the economy, the condition of the Central Bank and a review of the policies and measures
adopted by the Monetary Board, within four months after the end of each financial year. The
forty seventh Annual Report of the Monetary Board of the Central Bank, in respect of the
Year 1996, is submitted herewith in fulfilment of this obligation.
Central Bank of Sri Lanka at temporary premises, Level 35, West Tower, World Trade Centre, Echelon Square, Bank of Ceylon Mawatha. Colombo 1.
